articles.title: New Jersey lottery player wins $1 million in Friday's Mega Millions - NorthJersey.com
articles.description: No one won it all so the Mega Millions jackpot will increase to an estimated $61 million for Wednesday's drawing.
articles.content:
A New Jersey lottery player won a $1 million Friday night playing the Mega Millions.
